projects.title: Time To Clock Out
projects.description: A friendly chrome extension that reminds you to wrap up work after hours. Features customizable reminder time, interval, weekdays, and optional skipping of Taiwan public holidays.

projects.title: Secondhand Trading Dashboard
projects.description: A data visualization dashboard for secondhand trading platform, built with React and Recharts.

projects.title: React Gridstack Dashboard
projects.description: A customizable dashboard using React and Gridstack.js, allowing users to drag and resize widgets.

projects.title: LINE Translation Bot
projects.description: A LINE Bot providing instant translation with external translation APIs. Originally built in 2024; currently unmaintained.
